text: allāhana mārgadalli valase hōdātanu bhūmiyalli dhārāḷa āśrayagaḷannu hāgū sākaṣṭu vaiśālyavannu kāṇuvanu. Tanna maneyinda, allāh mattavana dūtareḍege valasiganāgi horaṭavanu (dāriyalli) mr̥tanādare, khaṇḍitavāgiyū avana pratiphalada hoṇe allāhana mēlide. Allāhanantū kṣamāśīlanū karuṇāmayiyū āgiddāne
